data.eml:eml: A new species of Ceratoteleas Kozlov (Hymenoptera, Scelionidae) from Japan, with a description of the male of Ceratoteleas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komeda, Yoto, Mita, Toshiharu, Yamagishi, Kenzo (2016): A new species of Ceratoteleas Kozlov (Hymenoptera, Scelionidae) from Japan, with a description of the male of Ceratoteleas. ZooKeys 609: 1-9, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.8852, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.8852
